briefTitle: Study to Assess the Efficacy and Safety of ACT-541468 (Daridorexant) in Adult and Elderly Subjects Suffering From Difficulties to Sleep
officialTitle: Multi-center, Double-blind, Randomized, Placebo-controlled, Parallel-group, Polysomnography Study to Assess the Efficacy and Safety of ACT-541468 in Adult and Elderly Subjects With Insomnia Disorder
summary: The main purpose of this study is to assess efficacy and safety of ACT-541468 (daridorexant) in adult and elderly subjects with insomnia disorder. Efficacy will be evaluated on objective and subjective sleep parameters.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline to Month 1 in Wake After Sleep Onset (WASO) (Sleep Maintenance)
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: From baseline to Month 1 (i.e. for up to 1 month)
